Text.val: 09.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CREM)
12.09.2012 GB SCR17422 Extended condition for allow store/modify the SECU

01.02.2007 AK SCR12273 writing to Blob history only after converting blob to str
29.08.2006 SH SCR11799 Changed transaction handling
27.03.2006 SH SCR9466 Changed writing of Blob history to be only for changes,
new rows will be triggered by database now
23.03.2006 SH SCR9466 Removed special test on production system to trigger the
creation of BLHS if a new CREM row is added to database
24.02.2006 SH SCR9466 Disabled writing of Blob history with GB501 in case of
using production system and a new CREM row has to be added, otherwise duplicate
BLHS rows are added to database, because of active database triggering
for the production database
24.11.2005 SH SCR9466 Added GB501 to write CREM_NOTICE changes to
BLOB history
//05.09.2005 AK SCR #8675 add scurities for legal information - official name
//24.08.2005 AK add a remark (no functional changes)
//27.07.2005 AK SCR #8675 add scurities for changes in charges free text
if validation Date is Today, update Record
only for "charges" - remark type = 699 or "Official name" remark type = 912
-- Do not write history if CREM row does not exists --> is triggered by
database
-- Set date of last update (Displayed per OCA tab)
(only values >= 100 and <=999 because other CREM_TYPE(s) are
used for other kind of remarks. Info: CREM_TYPE is also missused e.g.
CREM_TYPE = 1 / 2)
- Determine tab (CREM_TYPE = 100-199 = tab 1; CREM_TYPE = 200-299 = tab 2, etc.)
(Info. CREM_TYPE is also missused e.g. CREM_TYPE = 1 / 2)
do not change this description ('Free text on charges' ) because it is in use in
other programs for range purposes (AK)
